id: <string>, a unique identifier for the item, if not present then null
specVersion: <string>, the version of the specification, if not present then null
version: <integer>, the version number, if not present then null
created: <string>, the creation timestamp, if not present then null
status: <string>, the status of the item, if not present then null
validityPeriodStart: <string>, the start of the validity period, if not present then null
validityPeriodEnd: <string>, the end of the validity period, if not present then null
companyName: <string>, the name of the company, if not present then null
companyIds: <string>, unique identifiers for the company, if not present then null
productDescription: <string>, description of the product, if not present then null
productIds: <string>, unique identifiers for the product, if not present then null
productCategoryCpc: <string>, the CPC category of the product, if not present then null
productNameCompany: <string>, the name of the product as per the company, if not present then null
comment: <string>, any comments, if not present then null

pcf.declaredUnit: <string>, the declared unit, if not present then null
pcf.unitaryProductAmount: <string>, the amount per unit of product, if not present then null
pcf.pCfExcludingBiogenic: <string>, PCF excluding biogenic carbon, if not present then null
pcf.pCfIncludingBiogenic: <string>, PCF including biogenic carbon, if not present then null
pcf.fossilGhgEmissions: <string>, fossil GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.fossilCarbonContent: <string>, fossil carbon content, if not present then null
pcf.biogenicCarbonContent: <string>, biogenic carbon content, if not present then null
pcf.dLucGhgEmissions: <string>, dLUC GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.landManagementGhgEmissions: <string>, land management GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.otherBiogenicGhgEmissions: <string>, other biogenic GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.iLucGhgEmissions: <string>, iLUC GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.biogenicCarbonWithdrawal: <string>, biogenic carbon withdrawal, if not present then null
pcf.aircraftGhgEmissions: <string>, aircraft GHG emissions, if not present then null
pcf.characterizationFactors: <string>, characterization factors, if not present then null
ipccCharacterizationFactorsSources: <string>, IPCC characterization factors sources, if not present then null
crossSectoralStandardsUsed: <string>, cross-sectoral standards used, if not present then null

productOrSectorSpecificRules.operator: <string>, the operator, if not present then null
ruleNames: <string>, rule names, if not present then null
productOrSectorSpecificRules.otherOperatorName: <string>, the name of the other operator, if not present then null

pcf.biogenicAccountingMethodology: <string>, biogenic accounting methodology, if not present then null
pcf.boundaryProcessesDescription: <string>, boundary processes description, if not present then null
pcf.referencePeriodStart: <string>, reference period start, if not present then null
pcf.referencePeriodEnd: <string>, reference period end, if not present then null

geographicScope.geographyRegionOrSubregion: <string>, geographic region or subregion, if not present then null

secondaryEmissionFactorSources.name: <string>, the name of the source, if not present then null
secondaryEmissionFactorSources.version: <string>, the version of the source, if not present then null

pcf.exemptedEmissionsPercent: <number>, the percent of exempted emissions, if not present then null
pcf.exemptedEmissionsDescription: <string>, the description of exempted emissions, if not present then null
pcf.packagingEmissionsIncluded: <boolean>, whether packaging emissions are included, if not present then null
pcf.allocationRulesDescription: <string>, allocation rules description, if not present then null
pcf.uncertaintyAssessmentDescription: <string>, uncertainty assessment description, if not present then null
pcf.primaryDataShare: <number>, the share of primary data, if not present then null

dqi.coveragePercent: <number>, the percent coverage, if not present then null
dqi.technologicalDQR: <string>, technological DQR, if not present then null
dqi.temporalDQR: <string>, temporal DQR, if not present then null
dqi.geographicalDQR: <string>, geographical DQR, if not present then null
dqi.completenessDQR: <string>, completeness DQR, if not present then null
dqi.reliabilityDQR: <string>, reliability DQR, if not present then null

assurance.assurance: <boolean>, whether assurance is provided, if not present then null
assurance.providerName: <string>, the name of the assurance provider, if not present then null
